name: Wheelie
overview: Wheelie, catering to every young boy's dream, sees you riding the powerful Zedexaki 500 motorcycle. So far, so ordinary. But when you see a sign tempting you onto a private road with no speed limit, things take a turn towards the strange and surreal... The private road leads into a series of caves which are split into different levels. That makes it a lot harder to just roar along at top speed... this subterranean network is littered with ramps and dead ends, all of which spell danger to the tearaway biker.
